docs.snippet: Voluntary guidelines will be issued amid a spike in traffic fatalities in the last two years.

docs.snippet: Shares of the meat producer Tyson Foods tumbled after it disclosed disappointing fourth-quarter results and said its chief executive would step down.

docs.snippet: The app, for Apple TV, Amazon Fire TV and Xbox One, offers a wide variety of live content, including Thursday night N.F.L. games.

headline.main: New Twitter App Streams N.F.L. Games and Other Sports

docs.abstract: Twitter introduces free app for Apple TV, Amazon Fire TV and Microsoft's Xbox One that will showcase its move into live content, including sports.

docs.snippet: President Obama’s decision not to block a United Nations resolution condemning Israel laid bare grievances between him and Prime Minister Netanyahu.

docs.snippet: Guo Chuan had set off from San Francisco last week hoping to reach Shanghai in 20 days. The American Coast Guard found his trimaran drifting and unmanned.

docs.snippet: Stella McCartney on Monday gave further evidence that fashion brands are increasingly becoming entertainment companies as she closed her show with models twirling and dancing as if in a Broadway musical.
